REPAY_CAPITAL = #{repayCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVERDUE_FEE = #{overdueFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVERDUE_DAYS = #{overdueDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},

AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BORROWER_NAME = #{borrowerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BORROWER_TYPE = #{borrowerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LOAN_NAME = #{loanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORCE_LOSE_DATE = #{forceLoseDate,jdbcType=DATE},
